text: The Youth of Maxim () is a 1935 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.В Канне объявили программу ММКФЮность Максима (1934) It stars Boris Chirkov, Valentina Kibardina, and Mikhail Tarkhanov. ==Actors== * Boris Chirkov - Maksim * Valentina Kibardina - Natasha * Mikhail Tarkhanov - Polivanov * Stepan Kayukov - Dmitri "Dyema" Savchenko * Aleksandr Kulakov - Andrei == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1935 drama movies Category:1930s historical movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Kozintsev Category:Movies directed by Leonid Trauberg Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Youth of Maxim
